name: Strawberry Cream Pie.
description:
Delicious strawberry cream pie using only Wonder Flavours.  
**WF SC Strawberry (baked)**. This is the star of the recipe.  As in the real life recipe, the strawberry layer is layered with cooked strawberries and fresh strawberries with cream. This layer follows along by adding **WF Fresh Strawberries** and **WF SC Cream Filling**
The crust is **WF SC Graham Cracker Crust**.
To create meringue topping, **WF SC Flapper Pie** is used. 
After at least a 3 day steep this is a delicious strawberry vape with a combination of baked and fresh creamy strawberries on inhale with a slight bakery note with the baked strawberry on exhale.   
Enjoy ðŸ˜Š
author: TamVapes
